phases.noSignsData: No detailed signs information available for this phase.

details.proestrus: The early phase of the heat cycle. During this stage, the vulva begins to swell and there may be light bleeding. The female is not yet ready to mate and will typically reject male advances.
details.estrus: The fertile phase when mating is most likely to result in pregnancy. The discharge becomes lighter in color and the female becomes receptive to males. This is the optimal breeding window.
details.metestrus: The late phase of the heat cycle when fertility decreases. The discharge lessens and the female becomes less receptive to males. This phase transitions into diestrus.
details.diestrus: The phase after estrus when the body either prepares for pregnancy or returns to a normal state. Hormone production stabilizes.

signs.proestrus: Vulvar swelling, light bloody discharge, increased urination, restlessness, males showing interest but female rejecting advances
signs.estrus: Lighter/straw-colored discharge, receptive to males, 'flagging' behavior (moving tail to side), decreased swelling
signs.metestrus: Discharge decreasing, less receptive to males, vulvar swelling reducing, return to normal behavior
signs.diestrus: Discharge decreasing, less receptive to males, vulvar swelling reducing, return to normal behavior

deleteDialog.title: Delete Heat Cycle
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this heat cycle? This will also delete all associated log entries. This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this heat cycle?

heatTracking.noProgesteroneData: No progesterone data available for this heat cycle.

temperature.chartDescription: Daily body temperature tracking during heat cycle
temperature.noData: No temperature data available for this heat cycle
temperature.startTracking: Start logging temperatures to see trends
temperature.dropDescription: Significant drop on {{date}} ({{temp}}°C) - possible ovulation indicator
temperature.title: Temperature

progesterone.title: Progesterone
progesterone.chartDescription: Track progesterone levels throughout the heat cycle. LH surge typically occurs when levels rise from <2 to >5 ng/ml.
progesterone.noRetestNeeded: In mating window - no retest needed

baseline.title: Baseline
baseline.ovulation: Ovulation not yet started. Egg cells are maturing.
baseline.mating: Wait with mating. Retest in 3 days.

rising.title: Rising
rising.ovulation: 1-2 days until ovulation. LH surge is approaching.
rising.mating: Wait with mating. Retest in 2 days.

ovulation.title: Ovulation
ovulation.ovulation: Ovulation occurring now or within 24 hours.
ovulation.mating: Mating in 1-2 days. Fresh semen or AI.

fertile.title: Fertile
fertile.ovulation: 1-2 days after ovulation. Eggs are maturing.
fertile.mating: Mating today or tomorrow for best results.

optimal.title: Optimal
optimal.ovulation: 2-3 days after ovulation. Peak fertility window.
optimal.mating: Mating TODAY! This is the optimal window.

urgent.title: Urgent
urgent.ovulation: 3+ days after ovulation. Window is closing.
urgent.mating: Mate IMMEDIATELY if not already done.

mating.windowDescription: Based on progesterone levels and LH surge detection
mating.activeWindow: Optimal mating window is NOW! This is the peak fertility period.
mating.insufficientData: Need at least 2 progesterone tests to calculate optimal mating window

recommendationTexts.insufficientTests: Need at least 2 progesterone tests to calculate optimal mating window
recommendationTexts.lhSurgeIdentified: LH surge detected - optimal mating window identified
recommendationTexts.multipleMatings: Consider multiple matings within the window for best success rate
recommendationTexts.veryHighProgesterone: Very high progesterone levels - peak fertility period
recommendationTexts.noLhSurge: LH surge has not occurred yet
recommendationTexts.risingButLow: Progesterone levels rising but still low
recommendationTexts.testDailySoon: Test daily - LH surge may occur soon
recommendationTexts.approachingSurge: Progesterone levels moderate - approaching surge range
recommendationTexts.mayHaveMissedSurge: Progesterone elevated - may have missed LH surge
recommendationTexts.considerMatingNow: Consider mating now if not already done
recommendationTexts.windowClosing: Continue monitoring but window may be closing
